articles.title: BOL-MIL (0-3): muscle problem for Bartesaghi, in his place inside Estupinan
articles.summary: Muscle problem behind the left thigh for Davide Bartesaghi who was replaced in the 83rd minute by Massimiliano Allegri. In his place for these last minutes of the match was Pervis Estupinan.

articles.title: LIVE MN - Bologna-Milan (0-3): Bartesaghi out due to a flexor problem
articles.summary: 84' | Turning attempt by Fofana assisted by Estupinan. Well done to Ravaglia for being ready on his post and denying the Rossoneri the poker on 19.

articles.title: Bologna-Milan: Stefano Pioli also present at the Dall'Ara
articles.summary: This evening, Stefano Pioli, former Rossoneri coach who in the 2021-2022 season won the 19th scudetto in the history of the club from via Aldo Rossi, is also present in the stands of the Dall'Ara for Bologna-Milan.

articles.title: BOL-MIL (0-3): other fresh forces in the Devil, it's up to Jashari and Fullkrug
articles.summary: Other fresh forces in Milan: after Tomori and Ricci, Massimiliano Allegri brings on Ardon Jashari for Luka Modric and Niclas Fullkrug for Christopher Nkunku in the 72nd minute.

articles.title: BOL-MIL (0-3): double substitution by Allegri in the 68th minute, with Ricci and Tomori on
articles.summary: Double substitution for Milan in the 68th minute: Massimiliano Allegri decides to remove Ruben Loftus-Cheek, scorer of the Rossoneri's first goal, and Zachary Athekame from the field, and inserts Samuele Ricci and Fikayo Tomori in their place.

articles.title: Pisa, Hiljemark introduces himself: "For me it's a great opportunity"
articles.summary: (ANSA) - PISA, 03 FEB - "For me it is a great opportunity to be here and Pisa is a great club. I want to do a great job together, create the possibility of salvation".

articles.summary: Penalty kick won by Christopher Nkunku who was brought down in the area by Ravaglia with a low exit. The same French attacker goes from the spot and converts, wrong-footing the Bologna goalkeeper.
